root.name: King's Quest III: To Heir is Human
root.description: PlotIn a distant land called Llewdor, Gwydion works as a slave for a wizard named Manannan. He was kidnapped by the wizard as a child, and has no memory of his former life. One day Gwydion decides to flee from Manannan's claws, and return to the land he came from, Daventry. FeaturesTime-based puzzles, wherein the player must make sure that tasks are completed while the evil Manannan is awayBasic spell-making (also functions as the copy-protection)Classic Sierra text parser input CriticismFans of the series complained that the story had no connection to the previous games. Ties to the other games were revealed at the end of the game.
